OOC: Sure why not. This is after you started stabbing my back.

BIC:
Menasor felt the stabbing pain in his back, the metal there began to
shread, but he had a lot of fight left in him. He put his powerful arms to
the ground, and pushed, righting himself, then, with no logic or thought,
just pure instinct, spun himself, flailing his arms, to rid himself of his
attackers. He then noticed Firearm and remembered Astroblast's objective,
he reached for the hurt robot again.
